name: GPT-4o
description: OpenAI's versatile, high-intelligence flagship model that accepts both text and image inputs with a 128K context window

skills.name: Text Generation
skills.description: Generate coherent and contextually relevant text based on input prompts
examples: Write a poem about autumn leaves
Draft a business proposal for a startup

skills.name: Image Understanding
skills.description: Analyze and interpret images to provide relevant information and insights
examples: Describe what you see in this chart
Help me understand what this diagram is showing

skills.name: Function Calling
skills.description: Generate structured JSON outputs for function calling and API integrations
examples: Extract the contact information from this email
Convert this description into a JSON product specification
Parse this resume data into structured format

skills.name: Complex Reasoning
skills.description: Handle complex problem-solving tasks requiring multi-step reasoning
examples: Help me debug this programming issue
Analyze the logical fallacies in this argument
